revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "[(Column) 25]:;Phamenoth 1:;Sisois, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Herakles, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Patron, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Sokmenis, mother Taonnophris, obols 28;;Ptolemaios, son of Mysthes, grandson of Petheus, mother Charis, drachmas 24;;Petheus, son of Kanis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Heraklas, son of Apollonios, grandson of Heraklas, mother Taorsenouphis, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Harpalos, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Harphaesis, mother Tepheros, drachmas 16, obols 27;;Athenion, son of Pyrrhos, grandson of Athenion, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Theon, son of Petheus, grandson of Theon, mother Herais, drachmas 32;;in total for the day drachmas 112, obols 24;;(Phamenoth) 2 likewise:;Aphrodisios, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, drachmas 8;;Heraklas, son of Leonides, grandson of Kastor, mother Thaisas, drachmas 24;;Apynchis, son of Sarapion, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Thaisas, drachmas 12;;Petheus, sonof Didymos, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Eutyches, slave of Sarapias, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Achillas, grandson of Kastor, mother Aphrodous, drachmas 4;;Kastor alias Ptolemaios, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Kastor, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 16;;Ptolemaios, son of Agathos Daimon, grandson of Petheus, mother Stuynchis, obols 28;;for the 12th year Maron, son of Limnaios, grandson of Maron, mother Thaisas, copper drachmas 4 ? copper;;(Phamenoth) 3 likewise:;Horion, son of Kanis, grandson of Anchophis, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Psenesis, son of Parmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Papeeis, fatherless, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8, obols 28;;Heras, son of Petsiris, grandson of Heras, mother Isidora, drachmas 4;;Sokmenis, son of Sokrates, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tapasion, obols 28;;Mysthes, son of Petheus, grandson of Mysthes, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Chairemon, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Pasoxis, mother Tanephremis, drachmas 4;;Esouris, son of Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis, obols 28;;Paouetis, son of Petheus, grandson of Phasis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Pasoknopaios, son of Phasis, grandson of Esouris, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Heras, son of Melanas, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamystha, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 72, obols 26;;Petheus, son of Nestosiris, grandson of Petheus, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Heras, son of Kelolis, grandson of Heras, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Perigenes, son of Zoilos, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Sambathion, drachmas 4;;Mystharion, son of Petheus, grandson of Esouris, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Marres, grandson of Heras, mother Soeris, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Ammonios, son of Harpagathes, grandson of Heras, mother Segathis, drachmas 8."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion); BL III, 113 (on l. 1084). Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
